title: Must Read: Estée Lauder Names New Chief Digital and Marketing Officer, Brands Are Beginning to Embrace Reddit
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Wednesday. Former Global CMO of Nestlé Aude Gandon has been appointed chief digital and marketing officer at The Estée Lauder Companies — a new role for the beauty conglomerate. She will oversee its digital and media ecosystem and strategize ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
